title: Add product upload instructions to admin interface

requirements.text: Add an informational section to the admin products page explaining how to upload products, including: clicking the 'Add Product' button, filling in the product form with name/description/price, selecting an image file (max 5MB), and clicking 'Add Product' to save
acceptanceCriteria: Instructions are clearly visible on the AdminProducts page
Instructions explain the complete product upload workflow step-by-step
Instructions mention the 5MB image size limit
Instructions are styled consistently with the existing warm earth tone design theme

constraints: Do not modify the existing product upload functionality
Maintain the existing layout and design patterns of the AdminProducts page
nonGoals: Changing the product upload form or validation logic
Adding new product fields or capabilities
